channel.title: .rad
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]/rad[/b][/size] [hr] [size=10pt][u]Idea[/u][/size]
This is just a random idea I had to make a radio station. I will be using the ShoutCAST service for WinAMP. You will need WinAMP to listen. [hr] [size=10pt][u]Playlist and Requests[/u][/size]
I will be doing requests as much as possible. Just PM me or e-mail or something. Even post it here, and I will get around to adding it.
The current music I have for play is basically a ton of Metal and Industrial. Video Game music will also be played, as some tracks r0x. [hr] [size=10pt][u]You[/u][/size]
If you have any music you would like to broadcast that you've created, let me know. I will add it to the list of tracks. Please, edit your file information to where you can be contacted, track title, your alias ect. [hr]
In which case I would like to get this running by Friday or so. Any questions and ideas can be posted here.

item.title: .rad
item.dc:creator: @kxolsd kxolsd
item.description:
@kxolsd wrote:

[size=18pt][b]/rad[/b][/size]
[hr]
[size=10pt]Idea[/size]

This is just a random idea I had to make a radio station.
I will be using the ShoutCAST service for WinAMP. You will need WinAMP to listen.
[hr]
[size=10pt]Playlist and Requests[/size]

I will be doing requests as much as possible. Just PM me or e-mail or something. Even post it here, and I will get around to adding it.

The current music I have for play is basically a ton of Metal and Industrial.
Video Game music will also be played, as some tracks r0x.
[hr]
[size=10pt]You[/size]

If you have any music you would like to broadcast that you've created, let me know.
I will add it to the list of tracks. Please, edit your file information to where you can be contacted, track title, your alias ect.
[hr]

In which case I would like to get this running by Friday or so.
Any questions and ideas can be posted here.
